title: Parametric Circles and Lines - arc of circle

content.question: Consider the arc of a circle with radius <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> and center at <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. Which of the following is a parametrization of this arc defined by <math alttext="open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared plus open parentheses y minus 2 close parentheses squared equals 1"><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math> from <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> counterclockwise to <math alttext="open parentheses negative 2 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses negative 1 plus cos t comma 2 plus sin t close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> from <math alttext="t equals 0"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="t equals pi over 2"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses negative 1 plus cos t comma 2 plus sin t close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> from <math alttext="t equals pi over 2"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> to <math alttext="t equals pi"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses negative 2 plus cos t comma 1 plus sin t close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> from <math alttext="t equals 0"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="t equals pi"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses negative 1 plus cos open parentheses 2 t close parentheses comma 2 plus sin open parentheses 2 t close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> from <math alttext="t equals pi over 4"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> to <math alttext="t equals pi"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses negative 1 plus cos t comma 2 plus sin t close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> from <math alttext="t equals pi over 2"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> to <math alttext="t equals pi"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi></math>
